name: Embers Rekindled
description: When Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames, who has this card equipped, triggers Fiery Rebirth: discard this card and apply Aegis of Abyssal Flame and Pyro to the character.
descriptionraw: When $[A2302], who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123022]</color>: discard this card and apply $[K1006] and Pyro to the character.
descriptionreplaced: When Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames, who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fiery Rebirth</color>: discard this card and apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Aegis of Abyssal Flame</color> and Pyro to the character.
